ygData.subject: Re: Lower Guk
ygData.msgSnippet: IMO Bag of sewn evil eye is not that great for a monk as it is rather heavy and only reduces by 75%. it is good to have till you can get thebox of abukar
ygData.messageBody:
IMO Bag of sewn evil eye is not that great for a monk as it is rather heavy
and only reduces by 75%. it is good to have till you can get thebox of
abukar and/or a large soiled bag. with all of this i am still at 7 total
wieght.

Kizmet Bayashi
39th level monk
Da`Kor
E-Marr
----- Original Message -----
From: Timothy Hall <bloom_meister@...>
To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, September 28, 1999 7:51 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Lower Guk


> From: "Timothy Hall" <bloom_meister@...>
>
>
> >I'm looking for any info on lower guk, specifically a mob list
(preferably
> >with level range listed but not nessessary) and a map of the tower. Can
> >anyone help me out with this? You know, point me at a website or
something.
> >
> >Thanks
> >Avangela Eladamri
> >Monk of the 34th circle
> >Xegony
> >
>
> try this:
>
> Silversilk : legs common drop from ghoul archmage
> Executioners hood : common drop from ghoul executioner
> Guise of the deciever : common drop from ghoul assassin
> Bag of sewn evil eyes : Common drop from evil eyes
> Crown of froglok kings : common drop from froglok king
> Azure sleeves : common drop from Minotaur patriarch
> Silver plated braces : common drop from shin lord (his rare is ghoulsbane)
> Adamantium ring : rare drop from animated hand
>
> Thats the good monk stuff
> Have fun
> Mitch 23rd E Marr
>
> >
